## 1) Top Themes  
- Security threats to critical subsea data infrastructure  
- Regulatory and project challenges in offshore wind development

## 2) Top Stories  
- Finnish police have seized a ship and detained its Russian crew over allegations of cutting a subsea cable critical for data transmission. (Source: datacenterdynamics.com)  
- Orsted is challenging the US government's halt on its $5 billion offshore wind project, signaling regulatory friction in renewables deployment. (Source: Reuters)  
- Britain’s FTSE-100 index reached the 10,000 mark for the first time, marking a significant financial milestone. (Source: Reuters)  
- Multiple reports cover a deadly fire in a Swiss ski resort bar with about 40 fatalities caused likely by champagne sparklers. (Source: CNN, Reuters)  
- Notable incidents like a suspected mountain lion attack and political changes in NYC were also reported but are outside PTD’s core sectors. (Source: CNN, Reuters)
